text: The following are the 20 longest rivers of Norway ranked by length (in miles): # Glomma (373) # Pasvikelva and Ivalojoki (236) (86 in Norway, 149 in Finland) # Numedalslågen (218) # Gudbrandsdalslågen and Vorma (218) # Tanaelva (216) # Drammensvassdraget (Drammenselva) (187) # Skiensvassdraget (155) # Begna (155) # Otra (152) # Trysilelva (144) # Altaelva (142) # Namsen (141) # Hallingdalselva and Snarumselva (136) # Arendalsvassdraget (Nidelva (Aust- Agder)) (129) # Orklaelva (106) # Renaelva (102) # Vefsna (101) # Nea- Nidelvvassdraget (96) # Karasjohka (96) # Gaula (90) ==Other rivers== Other rivers include: *Akerselva *Flakstadelva == References == * De lengste elvene i Norge ("The longest rivers in Norway" (Norwegian) from the Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate) Norway * Norway rivers
title: List of rivers of Norway
